        Parameters:
        length - matrix length
        threadLength - thread length
        m1 - Input matrix
        m2 - Input matrix
        m3 - return matrix
        side - quarter of matrix
        type - solution type which barrier selected
        barrierBehaviour - synchronized variable to barrier problem

      • dftSolver

        public Matrix dftSolver(Matrix matrix1,
                        int[] idxes)
        first two for traverse quarter of a matrix second two fro traverse all matrix formula by dft.
        Parameters:
        matrix1 - sum matrix
        idxes - (startColumn,endColumn,startRow,endRow)
        Returns:
        dft matrix

      • solver

        public void solver()
        This method solves this problem using no mutex and monitor. first determines quarter side of thread sum matrixes according two type makes barrier syncronization then calculate dft
